course_name: Strategic Analysis and Implementation in Health
description: This course investigates the concepts and techniques of strategic analysis and implementation at the business and corporate levels of the health industry. Specific concepts examined include industry and environment analysis; business strategy analysis; organisation performance analysis; capabilities analysis; gap analysis; business and corporate strategic options; strategic decision making; implementation; corporate strategic analysis; mergers & acquisitions; and strategic alliances.
restricted: Restricted to students in the GCMedLead program
